extDesc.message: A Chrome extension for sending push messages to a Gotify server

contextMenuTitle.description: The text for the context menu item.

contextMenuConfigTitle.description: Title for context menu configuration section

notificationNoConfig.message: Please configure server and Token in plugin settings first
notificationNoConfig.description: Message shown when no Gotify config is present

notificationWithTitle.description: Notification message template that includes the title

notificationError.message: Error: $1. Please check network, URL, or Token.
notificationError.description: Notification message template for errors with substitution

defaultTitle.description: Default title used when user doesn't provide one

alertMinOneToken.message: Please add at least one valid Token
alertMinOneToken.description: Alert shown when no token is provided

validationTokenRequired.description: Error message when token is invalid or empty

validationRemarkRequired.description: Error message when remark is empty

validationUrlRequired.message: Valid Gotify server URL is required
validationUrlRequired.description: Error message when server URL is invalid

validationAtLeastOneToken.message: At least one token is required
validationAtLeastOneToken.description: Error message when no tokens are provided

validationTokenFormat.message: Token must be at least 5 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and symbols (+, /, =, _, ., -)
validationTokenFormat.description: Detailed error message for token format validation
